mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, name, passwd, phone, email, birth, sex, grade, rdate) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{sex}, 'N', now())
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, name, passwd, phone, email, birth, sex, grade, rdate FROM member ORDER BY memberno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log(ip, sf, memberno, rdate) VALUES(#{ip}, #{sf}, #{memberno}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT logno, memberno, ip, rdate, sf FROM log ORDER BY logno DESC
